children.title: Basic Navigation
children.description: Learn how to use code to zoom, pan, and rotate the map control.

children.title: Set the Map Extent
children.description: Learn how to set the map extent in a variety of different ways.

children.title: Display a Shapefile Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a shapefile layer.

children.title: Display a FileGeoDatabase Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a file geodatabase layer.

children.title: Display a TinyGeo Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a TinyGeo layer.

children.title: Display a S57 (Nautical Charts) Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display S57 nautical charts.

children.title: Display a GPX Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a GPX layer.

children.title: Display a TAB Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a TAB layer.

children.title: Display an ISOLine Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display an ISOLine layer.

children.title: Display an InMemory Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display an in memory layer.

children.title: Display a Graticule Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a graticule line layer.

children.title: Display a KML Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a KML file.

children.title: Display a GeoPdf Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a PDF file.

children.title: Display a SQLite Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a SQLite layer.

children.title: Display a Postgres Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a Postgres layer.

children.title: Display an Oracle Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a Oracle layer.

children.title: Display a SQL Server Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a SQL Server layer.

children.title: Display a NOAA Weather Station Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display NOAA weather stations current readings to your map.

children.title: Display a NOAA Weather Warning Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display NOAA weather warnings to your map.

children.title: Display a Cloud Maps Raster Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display ThinkGeo cloud raster background images.

children.title: Display a Cloud Maps Vector Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display ThinkGeo cloud vector background maps.

children.title: Display a Cloud Maps Vector Layer Off-line
children.description: This sample show how to use an off-line version of ThinkGeo Cloud Map Vector data.

children.title: Display a Bing Map Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a Bing Maps layer.

children.title: Display a Google Map Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a Google Maps layer.

children.title: Display an OpenStreetMap Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a Open Street Maps layer.

children.title: Display a WMS Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a WMS layer. (This sample may be slow as we use a public WMS sever)

children.title: Display an ECW Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a ECW image.

children.title: Display a GeoTiff Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a GeoTiff image.

children.title: Display a Gdal Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display raster format data supported by Gdal.

children.title: Display a MrSid Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a MrSids layer.

children.title: Display a ESRI Grid Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a ESRI grid layer.

children.title: Display Common Raster Layers
children.description: This sample shows how to display common images types such as PNG, JPEG, Bitmap etc.

children.title: Display a JPEG2000 Layer
children.description: This sample shows how to display a JPEG2000 image.

children.title: Generate a Map as an Image
children.description: This sample shows how to draw your map onto an image file

children.title: Refreshing Dynamic Items
children.description: Learn how to use overlays to display dynamically refreshing data. This sample will shows how to refresh 20,000 polygons every seconds.

children.title: Caching Map Tiles
children.description: Learn how to cache map tiles. Caching tiles on an Overlay allows you to store images of rendered areas on the local disk and reuse them for faster rendering times. Saved tile images can be found in the cache folder within this project's debug folder.

children.title: Draw GPS Location Overlay Sample
children.description: Learn how to display a GPS vehicle's movements in real-time

children.title: Display Bing Maps Overlay
children.description: Learn to render Bing Maps using the BingMapsOverlay. A valid Bing Maps ApplicationID is required. Visit the Bing Maps Dev Portal to sign up for a key (https://www.bingmapsportal.com/).

children.title: Display Cloud Maps Raster Overlay
children.description: Learn to render ThinkGeo Cloud Maps in raster format. Sign up for your own ThinkGeo Cloud API key at https://cloud.thinkgeo.com!

children.title: Display Cloud Maps Vector Overlay
children.description: Learn to render ThinkGeo Cloud Maps in vector format. Sign up for your own ThinkGeo Cloud API key at https://cloud.thinkgeo.com!

children.title: Display Google Maps Overlay
children.description: Learn to render Google Maps using the GoogleMapsOverlay. A Google Maps API key is required. Visit the Google Maps Platform page to sign up for a key (https://cloud.google.com/maps-platform/ *The default Google Maps Static API Key returns images up to 640 x 640 pixels).

children.title: Display OpenStreetMap Overlay
children.description: Learn to render OpenStreetMap using the OpenStreetMapOverlay. OpenStreetMap Tiles are not meant for heavy production use without express permission from the OpenStreetMap Foundation. See https://operations.osmfoundation.org/ for details about their usage policies.

children.title: Display a WMS Overlay
children.description: Learn to render a Web Map Service using the WMSOverlay. Please be aware that this is a publicly available WMS server and it may be slow to load.

children.title: Display a Background Overlay
children.description: Learn how to display a background overlay

children.title: Draw, Edit, or Delete Shapes using the InteractiveOverlay
children.description: Learn to draw, edit, or delete shapes using the map's TrackOverlay and EditOverlay.

children.title: Grouping Layers Using LayerOverlay
children.description: Learn to group layers into logical groups using LayerOverlays.

children.title: Print Maps Using PrintOverlay
children.description: Learn to print maps using the PrintOverlay.

children.title: Using Markers
children.description: Learn to add, edit, or remove markers on the map using the MarkerOverlay.

children.title: Using Popups
children.description: Learn to add, edit, or remove popups on the map using the PopupOverlay.

children.title: Display a Logo Adornment
children.description: Learn to render a custom logo on the map.

children.title: Display Map Mouse Coordinates
children.description: Learn to render coordinate info based on the mouse cursor position on the map.

children.title: Display a Map ScaleLine
children.description: Learn to render a ScaleLine on the map in a variety of different of styles.

children.title: Display a Map PanZoomBar
children.description: Learn to render a PanZoomBar on the map.

children.title: Create a Point Style
children.description: Learn how to style point data using a PointStyle

children.title: Create a Line Style
children.description: Learn how to style line data using a LineStyle

children.title: Create an Area Style
children.description: Learn how to style polygon data using an AreaStyle

children.title: Create a Text Style
children.description: Learn how to label data using a TextStyle

children.title: Create a Filter Style
children.description: Learn how to selectively style features using a FilterStyle

children.title: Create a Heat Style
children.description: Learn how to create a heat map from data using a HeatStyle

children.title: Create a Cluster Style
children.description: Learn how to cluster point data dynamically using a ClusterPointStyle

children.title: Create a ClassBreak Style
children.description: Learn how to style data based on numeric values using a ClassBreakStyle

children.title: Create a Dot Density Style
children.description: Learn how to style polygons based on numeric data values

children.title: Create a Regex Style
children.description: Learn how to style select features using regex expressions

children.title: Create a Value Style
children.description: Learn how to style data based on data values using a ValueStyle

children.title: Create a Flee Boolean Style
children.description: Learn how to style data based on data values using a FleeBooleanStyle

children.title: Styling Across Multiple Scales
children.description: Learn how to style layers across multiple scales using different styles assigned to different ZoomLevels

children.title: Setting the Projection of a Layer
children.description: Learn how to automatically reproject a layer using the ProjectionConverter class

children.title: Raster Projection Sample
children.description: Learn how to reproject a raster layer using the ProjectionConverter class

children.title: World Projections Sample
children.description: A small collection of some interesting projections.

children.title: Projecting Features
children.description: Learn how to reproject features using the ProjectionConverter class

children.title: Union Shapes
children.description: Learn how to union shapes into a single shape

children.title: Buffer Shape
children.description: Learn how to buffer a shape

children.title: Simplify Shape
children.description: Learn how to simplify a shape's geometry

children.title: Rotate Shape
children.description: Learn how to rotate a shape

children.title: Scale Shape
children.description: Learn how to scale a shape

children.title: Translate Shape
children.description: Learn how to translate a shape

children.title: Calculate Center Point
children.description: Learn how to calculate the center point of a feature

children.title: Calculate Area
children.description: Learn how to calculate the area of a feature

children.title: Calculate Length
children.description: Learn how to calculate the length of a line

children.title: Calculate Shortest Line Between Shapes
children.description: Learn how to calculate the shortest line between two shapes

children.title: Get Line on a Line
children.description: Learn how to get part of a line from an existing line

children.title: Clip Shape
children.description: Learn how to clip a shape from another shape

children.title: Difference Shapes
children.description: Learn how to find the difference of shapes

children.title: Get Convex Hull
children.description: Learn how to get the convex hull of a shape

children.title: Get Envelope
children.description: Learn how to get the envelope of a shape

children.title: Check if Feature Contains
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer contain a shape

children.title: Check if Feature Crosses
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer a shape crosses

children.title: Check if Features are Disjoint
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are disjoint from a shape

children.title: Check if Features are Equal
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are topologically equal to a shape

children.title: Check if Feature Intersects
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer intersect a shape

children.title: Check if Feature Overlaps
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer overlap a shape

children.title: Check if Feature Touches
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are touching a shape

children.title: Check if Feature is Within Another Feature
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are within a shape

children.title: Get Features Within a Distance
children.description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find features in a layer within a given distance of a point

children.title: Get Data from All Features
children.description: Learn how to get data from all features in a ShapeFile

children.title: Get Data from One Feature
children.description: Learn how to get data from a feature in a ShapeFile

children.title: Validate Point Topology
children.description: Learn how to use the TopologyValidator APIs to perform validation on points

children.title: Validate Line Topology
children.description: Learn how to use the TopologyValidator APIs to perform validation on lines

children.title: Validate Polygon Topology
children.description: Learn how to use the TopologyValidator APIs to perform validation on polygons

children.title: Routing
children.description: Learn how to use the RoutingCloudClient to route through a set of waypoints with the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Routing - Service Area
children.description: Learn how to use the RoutingCloudClient to find the service area of a location with the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Routing - Traveling Sales Person
children.description: Learn how to use the RoutingCloudClient to find an optimized route through a set of waypoints with the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Elevation
children.description: Learn how to use the ElevationCloudClient class to get elevation data from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Geocoding
children.description: Learn how to use the GeocodingCloudClient to access the Geocoding APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Reverse Geocoding
children.description: Learn how to use the ReverseGeocodingCloudClient to access the ReverseGeocoding APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Color Utilities
children.description: Learn how to use the ColorCloudClient class to access the ColorUtilities APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Timezone
children.description: Learn how to use the TimezoneCloudClient to access the Timezone APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Projection
children.description: Learn how to use the ProjectionCloudClient to access the Projection APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: World Maps Query
children.description: Learn how to use the MapsQueryClient to query the WorldMaps dataset available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

children.title: Extending Styles
children.description: Learn how to use the Style base class to create your own custom styles.

children.title: Extending Layers
children.description: Learn how to use the Layer base class to create your own custom layers.

children.title: Extending Feature Sources
children.description: Learn how to use the FeatureSource base class to create your own custom Feature Source.

children.title: Interpolation Methods (TODO)
children.description: Learn how to do grid based interpolation using various methods
